# SignSide Enumeration

> [!CAUTION]
> This enum is still in pre-release.  Its signature may change or it may be removed in future releases.

Represents a side of a sign.

## Constants
### **Back**
`Back = "Back"`

The back of the sign.
### **Front**
`Front = "Front"`

The front of the sign.
